# isHidden

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the system hides this achievement from the player.

## Declaration

```swift
var isHidden: Bool { get }
```

## Deprecated Properties

- **playerID**: A string that identifies the player who earned the achievement.

items.description: A string that identifies the player who earned the achievement.
items.name: playerID
